title: Braised Brussels Sprouts With Bacon Recipe
summary: Braised Brussels Sprouts With Bacon Recipe is a gluten free and dairy free recipe with 4 servings. For $1.19 per serving, this recipe covers 17% of your daily requirements of vitamins and minerals. One portion of this dish contains approximately 8g of protein, 10g of fat, and a total of 160 calories. A mixture of bacon, soy sauce, brussels sprouts, and a handful of other ingredients are all it takes to make this recipe so tasty. This recipe is liked by 27 foodies and cooks. A few people really liked this side dish. From preparation to the plate, this recipe takes approximately 30 minutes. With a spoonacular score of 71%, this dish is solid. Try Ale-braised Corned Beef, Brussels Sprouts, And Carrots Recipe, Braised Brussels sprouts with bacon, and Brussels Sprouts with Kimchi and Bacon Recipe for similar recipes.
